column1: ##Project Description=Basic Details: 	  Sample Submission ID	51_1056  User	Kawata Manabu  Lab	Lotz  Account Code	(08)RAG049617B(C3-554316)-100.00%  Fee	110.00 USD  Discount	0.00%  Actual Fee	110.00 USD  Quoted Amount	110.00 USD  Expected Date	  Actual Date	  Service Id	 	 	 Project Information:	 Study title	Lotz_03292021-1_MK Sample Type description (e.g. Jurkat cell line: liver tissue)	Human chondrocytes Species	Human 	 Services:	 Please briefly describe what you would like the Genomics Core to do for you	DRUG-seq 	 Samples:	 Number of Samples submitted	11 How many reads per sample are needed?	5 million reads per sample How many reads total for all samples are needed?	55 million reads 	 Additional Information:	 Would you like Genomics Core to prepare your sequencing libraries?	Yes Which kit? (if not sure: Genomics Core will provide this information)	 Would you like the CCBB to provide data analysis?	Yes We highly recommend completing this section in anticipation of future GEO submissions	 Goal of the Project	To identify genes that are differentially regulated by KLF2 and KLF4 in human chondrocytes. We want to do some more analyses by using the samples without adenovirus as controls. Details of requested bioinformatics analyses	DURG-seq analysis with differentially expressed genes (DEGs) as output.  The analyses to be done are as follows:	 1) Ad-EGFP without IL1b vs No-Ad without IL1b	 2) Ad-KLF2 without IL1b vs No-Ad without IL1b	 3) Ad-KLF4 without IL1b vs No-Ad without IL1b	 4) Ad-EGFP with IL1b vs No-Ad with IL1b	 5) Ad-KLF2 with IL1b vs No-Ad with IL1b	 6) Ad-KLF4 with IL1b vs No-Ad with IL1b	 7) No-Ad with IL1b vs No-Ad without IL1b	 References to closely related work (optional)	Derived from the same experiments of Lotz_12142020_MK 	 Experimental Variables:	 Variable 1	 Variable 2	 Variable 3	 Variable 4	 Variable 5	 Variable 6	 Variable 7	 	 Service Items:	 DrugSeq	 number of samples	11 Price	10 Total	110

##Analysis Notes=Dispatch BCL data (y/n): n Dispatch fastqs (y/n): y Analysis requested (y/n): y,  DURG-seq analysis with differentially expressed genes (DEGs) as output. The analyses to be done are as follows: 1) Ad-EGFP without IL1b vs No-Ad without IL1b 2) Ad-KLF2 without IL1b vs No-Ad without IL1b 3) Ad-KLF4 without IL1b vs No-Ad without IL1b 4) Ad-EGFP with IL1b vs No-Ad with IL1b 5) Ad-KLF2 with IL1b vs No-Ad with IL1b 6) Ad-KLF4 with IL1b vs No-Ad with IL1b 7) No-Ad with IL1b vs No-Ad without IL1b CC dispatch emails also to: mkawata@scripps.edu
